author: UltPanda
description: Comprehensive League of Legends integration using Riot Games API. Look up summoner stats, match history, champion rotations, mastery data, live games, and more with intelligent rate limiting.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the League of Legends cog! Use `[p]help lol` to get started. Don't forget to set your Riot API key with `[p]lolset apikey <key>`.
short: Complete League of Legends integration with Riot Games API
